abstract: Next week’s meeting of the Fed’s policy makers is likely to focus on how much to cut rates and may mark a defining moment for the Ben S. Bernanke, the Fed chairman.
snippet: Next week’s meeting of the Fed’s policy makers is likely to focus on how much to cut rates and may mark a defining moment for the Ben S. Bernanke, the Fed chairman.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 13 — When policy makers at the Federal Reserve meet to set interest rates on Tuesday, their debate is likely to be less about whether to reduce rates than about how much.

headline.main: For Fed, a Question of Whom to Rescue, and When to Dive In
headline.print_headline: For Fed, a Question Of Whom to Rescue, And When to Dive In
